Translations.Text: Tamen xunwen xin yue de qingzhuang, ni shuo:`Xin yue shi renshi he chaojin de shiji.'Zhengyi jue bushi cong fangwu houmian chuan dong jinqu, dan zhengyi shi jingwei. Nimen dang cong menhu zou jin fangwu, dang jingwei zhenzhu, yibian nimen chenggong.
Nimen dang wei zhu dao er dikang jingong nimen de ren, nimen buyaoguo fen, yin wei zhenzhu biding bu xi'aiguo fen zhe.

Nimen zai nali faxian tamen, jiu zai nali shalu tamen; bing jiang tamen zhu chu jingwai, youru tamen congqian quzhu nimen yiyang, pohai shi bi shalu geng canku de. Nimen buyao zai jin si fujin he tamen zhandou, zhidao tamen zai nali jingong nimen; ruguo tamen jingong nimen, nimen jiu yingdang shalu tamen. Bu xindao zhe de baochou shi zheyang de.
Ruguo tamen tingzhan, namo, zhenzhu que shi zhi she de, que shi zhi ci de.
Nimen dang fankang tamen, zhidao pohai xiaochu, er zongjiao zhuan wei zhenzhu; ruguo tamen tingzhan, namo, chu buyi zhe wai, nimen jue buyao qinfan renhe ren.

Jin yue dichang jin yue, fan yingdang zunjing de shiwu, dou shi huxiang dichang de. Shui qinfan nimen, nimen keyi tongyang de fangfa baofu shui; nimen dang jingwei zhenzhu, dang zhidao zhenzhu shi yu jingwei zhe tong zai de.
Nimen dang wei zhu dao er shishe, nimen buyao zi tou yu miewang. Nimen ying dang xingshan; zhenzhu dique xi'ai xingshan de ren.

Nimen dang wei zhenzhu er wancheng da chao he xiao chao. Ruguo nimen bei kun yu zhongtu, namo, yingdang xian yi zhi yi de de xisheng. Nimen buyao ti fa, zhidao xisheng daoda qi ding suo. Nimen dangzhong shui wei shengbing huo tou bu you ji er ti fa, shui dang yi zhaijie, huo shishe, huo xian sheng, zuowei fa shu. Dang nimen ping'an di shihou, fan zai xiao chao hou xiangshou dao da chao de ren, dou yingdang xian yi zhi yi de de xisheng. Fan buneng xian sheng de, dou yingdang zai da chao qijian zhaijie san ri, gui jia hou zhaijie qi ri, gongji shi ri. Zhe shi jiajuan buzai jin si quyu nei de ren suo ying jin de yiwu. Nimen dang jingwei zhen zhu, nimen dang zhidao zhen zhu de xingfa shi yanli de.
